about_the_game:
Welcome to "Airplanes Dogfight Racer", an exciting air racing and battle game where winning is all about conquering the skies! Compete against other airplanes as enemies while completing the race and engaging in intense dogfights. With 5 different weapons to choose from, you can use your machine gun, missiles, mines, shield, and repair kits to emerge victorious.

Game Features

The game features alternative routes that offer strategic advantages, making the air race even more thrilling. Choose from three gameplay modes - Championship, Arcade, and Time Trial - and test your skills in solo or multiplayer split-screen modes. The game's difficulty levels, ranging from easy to hard, make it a perfect fit for both novice and expert players.

Five Heart-Pounding Race Tracks & 8 High-Flying Airplanes Await!

With five different tracks to unlock, as well as a garage where you can purchase eight different types of airplanes, "Sky Carnage: Aerial Anarchy" offers endless hours of entertainment. The unlock system allows you to unlock new items and tracks as you progress, keeping the game fresh and exciting.

Game Features Made Easy: Fly Planes, Boosters, Enemies, Weapons, and Local Leaderboards!

The game's features include an airplane controller, booster cooldown system, enemy AI, and a dogfight system with five weapons. With a local leaderboard, you can compete with your friends and local rivals for the top spot.

The game also includes a countdown system, which adds to the excitement and adrenaline rush. With all these amazing features, "Sky Carnage: Aerial Anarchy" is a game that you can't afford to miss. So, what are you waiting for? Download the game now and soar to victory in the skies!
detailed_description:
Special Offer

Dive into the heart of our gaming community on Discord and unlock a treasure trove of rewards! Join now and embark on a thrilling journey to score epic loot and dominate the leaderboard.


Free Weekend

"Prepare for adrenaline-pumping action in the skies with Sky Carnage: Aerial Anarchy!

🚀 Take to the skies in high-speed airplanes.
🎯 Unleash devastating firepower on your rivals.
🌎 Explore stunning, immersive landscapes.
💣 Engage in heart-pounding aerial battles.

Experience the ultimate airplane racer shooting game that will leave you breathless. Dominate the skies, obliterate your opponents, and become the ultimate flying ace.

🔥 Join the battle in Sky Carnage: Aerial Anarchy now and rewrite the rules of aerial combat!"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Airplanes Dogfight Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: window 7 and later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce3 or better
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx9 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx9 compatible

short_description: Shoot a machinegun, Launch missiles, Place mines, shield and repair your plane in the Dogfight Airplane racing game. Now compete in Championship, Arcade and Time Trial against the toughest Enemy Ai. Unlock Tracks and Planes to get the highest score on the local leaderboard
